description:
Mediex aims to become the leading digital solution for Medical Instrument development Industry. To achieve this, they are building an advanced ecosystem that combines manufacturing with, clinics, hospitals, Marketplaces, etc. Mediex is developed to support medical instrument manufacturers. Its use allows patient data to be decentralized and freely accessed at scale.

It also has dividends for those involved and a holder of MDX token can play an active role in the ecosystem: by rewarding them with MDX ERC-20 Tokens. Mediex wants to give their instrument with professionals with the technology needed according to a user, ease the patient load, and reward those who make valuable contributions.
name: Mediex
